original_title: Shakira: Live at Rock in Rio
overview: On September 30th, 2011, Shakira closed down day five of the 2011 'Rock In Rio' music festival with a high-energy set that included many of her English hits. The show was part of 'The Sun Comes Out' World Tour. Setlist: Estoy aquí / Te dejo Madrid / Si te vas / Whenever, Wherever / Inevitable / A'atini El Nay (Fairuz cover) / Nothing Else Matters (Metallica cover) / Despedida / Flamenco / Gypsy / La tortura / Ciega, sordomuda / Sale el sol / Las de la intuición / Loca / She Wolf / Ojos así / País tropical (Jorge Ben Jor cover) (with Ivete Sangalo) / Hips Don't Lie / Waka Waka (This Time for Africa)
title: Shakira: Live at Rock in Rio
